abstract: The deal will return about $84 billion to shareholders in what Vodafone said was the single largest return of value in history, according to a presentation on its website.
snippet: The deal will return about $84 billion to shareholders in what Vodafone said was the single largest return of value in history, according to a presentation on its website.

headline.main: Vodafone and Verizon Shareholders Approve Wireless Deal
